name: cardval
body: |- wceq(cfv(ccrd, c0), cint(crab(s0, con0, wbr(cv(s0), cen, c0))))

stmt.origin: mp2b(wceq(cfv(ccrd, c0), cint(crab(s0, con0, wbr(cv(s0), cen, c0)))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)))
stmt.pretty: mp2b((card ` c0)= ⋂ { s0 ∈ On | s0[≅]c0 }, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ dom(card))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(ccrd, c0), cint(crab(s0, con0, wbr(cv(s0), cen, c0))))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wceq(cfv(ccrd, c0), cint(crab(s0, con0, wbr(cv(s0), cen, c0)))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (card ` c0)= ⋂ { s0 ∈ On | s0[≅]c0 }
⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
⊣ (c0 ∈ 𝕌 → c0 ∈ dom(card))
⊣ (c0 ∈ dom(card)→(card ` c0)= ⋂ { s0 ∈ On | s0[≅]c0 })

comment: The value of the cardinal number function. Definition 10.4 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 85. See ~ cardval2 for a simpler version of its value. (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)
